TextLibrary.Text: The MRI Council has a mission for us.
The MRI Council has a mission for us.
Yes. They need us to reach the Gemini System.
Yes. They need us to reach the Gemini System.

They did not say, but I know that we are the two closest agents. Hacking the LeapGates is difficult, and the closer we are, the better. It will be best if we hack the Talus LeapGate and then the Gemini LeapGate.
